sentences.sentence: So do you faithfully replicate the same work, or do you unfaithfully let the garden look after itself?
sentences.translation: 那么现在你是忠诚地做同样的照管工作呢，还是不忠诚地让花园自生自灭？

sentences.sentence: And Phinehas son of Eleazar, the priest, said to Reuben, Gad and Manasseh, "Today we know that the LORD is with us, because you have not acted unfaithfully toward the LORD in this matter."
sentences.translation: 祭司以利亚撒的儿子非尼哈对流便人，迦得人，玛拿西人说：“今日我们知道耶和华在我们中间，因为你们没有向他犯了这罪。”
